snippet.title: Mercury Station Retro FPS Trailer
snippet.description:
Retro-styled FPS in the tradition of Doom and Wolf 3D -- complete and free. Fast engine, mouse-aimed, with quick and furious gameplay. All made in Game Maker.

Seven weapons, big, open levels that lend to exploration, lots of aliens to murder. What more do you want?

Get it here: 
http://sandbox.yoyogames.com/games/193226-mercury-station----includes-gmk

Download link will be on the right of the page if it isn't right below the screenshots.
